AT.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
AT.description: Capcoms zeitloses Meisterwerk, Street Fighter™ II, hat den Game Boy™ Advance mit dieser einzigartigen Version erobert: 16 Kämpfer und mehr Modi, als sich Fans von Kampfspieln wünschen können! Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival bietet mehr als ein halbes Dutzend unterschieldiche Modi, von Arcade bis Team Battle [Team-Kampf], und Time Attack [Zeitattacke] zu Missions [Missionen]. Und natürlich sind alle eure Lieblingskämpfer dabei, von Akuma bis Zangief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: Video

AU.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
AU.description: Capcom’s timeless masterpiece, Street Fighter™ II, conquered Game Boy™ Advance with this unique version featuring 16 combatants and more modes than a fighting game fan could wish for! Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival features more than half a dozen different modes to choose from, from Arcade to Team Battle, and Time Attack to Missions – plus all your favourite characters from Akuma to Zangief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: Video

BG.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival

Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival features more than half a dozen different modes to choose from, from Arcade to Team Battle, and Time Attack to Missions – plus all your favourite characters from Akuma to Zangief.

BE.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
BE.description: Street Fighter™ II, le chef d'œuvre de Capcom, a conquis Game Boy™ Advance avec cette version unique qui contient 16 combattants et des modes qui satisferont tous les fans de jeux de combats ! Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival contient plus d'une demi-douzaine de modes différents à choisir, de Arcade (Arcade) à Team Battle (Équipe de combat) et de Time Attack (Attaque de temps) à Missions (Missions) - en plus de tous vos personnages préférés, de Akuma à Zangrief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival : vidéo

ES.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
ES.description: Street Fighter™ II, la obra maestra de Capcom, ha conquistado la Game Boy™ Advance con esta versión única que incluye 16 luchadores y ¡más modos de los que los fans de los juegos de lucha podrían desear! Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival incluye más de media docena de modos diferentes entre los que elegir, de Arcade (Arcade) a Team Battle (Combate de equipo) y de Time Attack (Ataque de tiempo) a Missions (Misiones), además de tus personajes favoritos, desde Akuma hasta Zangief.

IT.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
IT.description: Il capolavoro di Capcom, Street Fighter™ II, ha conquistato il Game Boy™ Advance con questa versione unica che vanta di 16 lottatori e più modalità di quante un fan dei giochi di combattimento possa desiderare! Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival include più di una mezza dozzina di diverse modalità a cui poter giocare, da Arcade a Team Battle (Lotta a squadre), Time Attack (Lotta a tempo) fino a Missions (Missioni), oltre a tutti i tuoi personaggi preferiti, da Akuma fino a Zangief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: video

NL.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
NL.description: Capcom's tijdloze meesterwerk, Street Fighter™ II, veroverde de Game Boy™ Advance met deze unieke versie die 16 vechters bevat en meer spelstanden dan een vechtspel-fan zich kan wensen! Super Street FIghter II Turbo Revival bevat meer dan een half dozijn aan verschillende spelstanden om uit te kiezen, van Arcade tot Team Battle (team-gevecht), en van Time Attack (tijdsaanval) tot Missions (opdrachten) - en daarnaast al je favoriete personages, van Akuma tot Zangief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: Video

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: Video

PT.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
PT.description: A obra-prima intemporal da Capcom, Street Fighter™ II, conquistou a Game Boy™ Advance com esta versão única, que inclui 16 lutadores e mais modos do que qualquer fã de jogos de luta poderia desejar! Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival inclui mais de meia dúzia de modos diferentes à escolha, desde Arcade (Arcada) a Team Battle (Combate de Equipa) e Time Attack (Ataque Cronometrado) a Missions (Missões) – para além de todas as tuas personagens favoritas, desde Akuma a Zangief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: Vídeo

RU.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival
RU.description: Street Fighter™ II, неувядающий шедевр от Capcom, покорил сердца игроков, использующих систему Game Boy™ Advance, все благодаря таким особенностям, как широкий выбор из 16 бойцов и разнообразие игровых режимов! Особенности Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival включают: более полдюжины разных игровых режимов, от Arcade (Аркада) до Team Battle (Командный бой), и от Time Attack (Игра на время) до Missions (Миссии); а также ваши любимые персонажи от Akuma до Zangief.

movies.name: Super Street Fighter™ II Turbo Revival: видео
